description: A simple one pan dessert with a creamy fruit filling and a crunchy topping.
name: Apricot Tarte Tatin Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan on a medium heat, melt the butter and sugar for 3 minutes until the sugar has melted completed.
Add 3 tablespoons of the syrup from the apricots into the pan and allow to cook for 1 more minute.
Remove the apricots from the tin and slice them before placing on the base of a 6 inch or suitable cake tin.
Sprinkle the apricots with all spice and pour the warm sauce over them evenly.
Roll out the pastry and cover the apricots with the pastry, pierce with a fork numerous times before baking for 25 minutes.
Once cooked, remove from the oven and flip upside down onto a serving dish.
Whip the cream with the vanilla and serve with the tarte tatin.
